Key Match Events: Detroit Pistons guard Jaden Ivey broke his left leg in a collision during a win over the Orlando Magic.
Ivey was injured when Orlando’s Cole Anthony slipped and fell as he and Ivey went for the ball, causing Anthony’s momentum to carry him into Ivey’s planted leg.
Post-Match Reflections: Pistons coach J.B. Bickerstaff commented on the injury, stating, 'There’s no better person or teammate than J.I. and no one cares more about this than he does.'
